rows.label: qev092302_MSG0001
rows.name: That you, Hope? What's up? I thought we were meeting later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0002
rows.name: Um, were we? I don't remember making any plans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0003
rows.name: Seriously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0003_2
rows.name: You were JUST here with Ornella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0004
rows.name:
You told me you needed advice on something
and wanted to meet later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0005
rows.name:
You must be tired, girl. And here I thought
you asking for advice was weird![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0006
rows.name: No, I... This is so strange. What's going on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_JNK0010
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev092302_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ada for more information about the meeting.

rows.label: qev092302_JNK0020
rows.name: Assume

rows.label: qev092302_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Hope that someone must be impersonating her.

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0007
rows.name: Ask Hope! She's standing right there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0008
rows.name:
But that means this impostor has been
taking everyone out and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0009
rows.name:
Huh? So what's going on?
Did you really forget our conversation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0010
rows.name:
Look. You asked me to meet you on
the South Janpath Plain around midnight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0011
rows.name:
I figured it was really, REALLY serious
if you needed that much privacy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0012
rows.name:
But since you're always helping me out,
it seemed like the least I could do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0013
rows.name: I got your back, girl![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0014
rows.name:
N-no! That wasn't me!
It must've been the criminal we're chasing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0015
rows.name:
You're chasing a... Wait, what?
You better explain from the beginning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Oh my gosh. That's horrible! You have an evil twin?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0017
rows.name: We have to confront the criminal at Janpath Lake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0018
rows.name:
So please, Ada, don't go to the meeting.
Stay here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0019
rows.name: Ha! I'm a BLADE, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'd planned to pay you back by
listening to your troubles or whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0021
rows.name:
But now I can do it by acting as bait
for your deadly doppelganger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0022
rows.name: No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0022_2
rows.name: I won't have you risking yourself like that, Ada.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept Aid

rows.label: qev092302_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Hope she should take Ada up on her offer.

rows.label: qev092302_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline Aid

rows.label: qev092302_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Ada it's too dangerous to use her as bait.

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0023
rows.name: See?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0023_2
rows.name: I love you like a sister, Hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0024
rows.name:
But this taking on everything by yourself
garbage has got to stop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0025
rows.name:
I WANT to do this. And all you have to do
is shut up and accept the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0026
rows.name: I didn't ask you, pal. Look, I WANT to do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0027
rows.name: So you guys should shut up and accept the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0028
rows.name: You'd do the same thing for me, Hope. Am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0029
rows.name: Ada, I... Thank you. Truly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0030
rows.name:
I swear I'll catch whoever's responsible for this.
I really appreciate your help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0031
rows.name: There, was that so hard? All right, I'll go on ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092302_MSG0032
rows.name: Meet you on the South Janpath Plain around midnight. Got it?[ST:wait ]
